description: Brandwatch Benchmark is an add-on module that enables monitoring and comparison of social media metrics between your brands and competitors' brands, providing real-time competitive intelligence insights.

user_flows.description: Complete workflow for setting up Benchmark module and creating initial brand comparisons
prerequisites: Administrator role in Social Media Management
At least one owned brand and one competitor identified
Social media channels identified for monitoring

steps.description: Navigate to Benchmark for initial setup
details: Click Benchmark icon in Social Media Management sidebar
View 'Welcome to Benchmark!' landing page
Click 'Get Started' button to begin setup

steps.description: Set up your brand for monitoring
details: Enter brand name in 'My Brand' section
Add Facebook, Instagram, and/or Twitter channels
Use suggested channels list that appears after typing
Minimum requirement: one channel per brand

steps.description: Set up competitor brand for comparison
details: Enter competitor brand name
Add competitor's social media channels
Ensure exact Instagram handle names if adding Instagram
Verify channel suggestions are accurate
Click 'Compare' button after entering brand information
System sets up Brand Insights and Content Analysis dashboards
Wait for data aggregation to complete

channel_requirements.minimum: One channel per brand to begin benchmarking
channel_requirements.instagram_note: Must provide exact Instagram handle name

options: Single platform focus: Compare same networks (e.g., Facebook vs Facebook)
Multi-platform approach: Include multiple networks per brand
Comprehensive coverage: Use all available channels for complete picture
Direct competitors: Same industry and market
Aspirational brands: Larger competitors to benchmark against
Niche competitors: Specialized players in specific segments

outcomes: Benchmark module configured with initial brands
Brand Insights dashboard available for channel-level metrics
Content Analysis dashboard ready for post-level analysis
Foundation for ongoing competitive intelligence

user_flows.description: Administrative workflow for creating and managing brands within Benchmark system
prerequisites: Access to Social Media Management Administration
Channel information for brands to be added

details: Go to Social Media Management Administration
Select Benchmark > Brands section
View existing brands and channel usage
Click 'Create Brand' button
Enter descriptive brand name
Prepare to add social media channels
Search for Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube channels
Add relevant channels to the brand
Verify channel details: name, network, fans, username, indexing status
Use 'Mark as My Brand' toggle for owned brands
Leave toggle deactivated for competitor brands
Owned brands indicated by crown icon in brand list
Review channel count and slot usage
Check data availability for all channels
Ensure brand appears in dashboard brand selection
